application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 3 (materials) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would enhance the appearance of the development and safeguard the character and appearance of the area, in accordance with policy DM1 of The Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 2 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 4 (landscaping) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would ensure landscaping would safeguard the appearance and character of the area, and to enhance the appearance of the development, in accordance with policy DM1 of The Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 3 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 6 (Disposal of Surface Water) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would ensure that adequate drainage facilities are provided, reduce and mitigate the effects of flood risk in accordance with policy DM10 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 4 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 7 (Disposal of Sewage) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would to ensure that adequate drainage facilities are provided in accordance with policy DM10 of the Councils Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 5 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 8 (Surface Water Attenuation And Storage) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would prevent the increased risk of flooding, reduce and mitigate the effects of flood risk in accordance with policy DM10 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 6 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 15 (boundary treatment) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would safeguard the appearance and character of the area, and to enhance the appearance of the development, in accordance with policy DM1 of The Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.
description: Details pursuant to conditions 3 (materials), 4 (landscaping), 6 (disposal of sewage), 7 (disposal of surface water), 8 (surface water attenuation and storage), 14 (cycle parking) and 15 (boundary treatment) attached to planning permission P/2421/20 dated 14/10/2020 for Second floor extension to create one x one bed flat (C3); Alterations to existing flats on ground and first floor to include single storey front extension; Single storey side extension to create entrance ; First floor front extension; First floor side extension; Balcony at first floor rear;  Refuse and Cycle Storage
